snippet: Marcel Kittel of Germany won the 10th stage of the Tour de France on Tuesday in a sprint finish, and Chris Froome stayed out of trouble to keep the leader’s yellow jersey.
abstract: Marcel Kittel of Germany wins 10th stage of Tour de France in a sprint finish, and Chris Froome stays out of trouble to keep the leader’s yellow jersey.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Kittel of Germany won the 10th stage of the Tour de France on Tuesday in a sprint finish, and Chris Froome stayed out of trouble to keep the leader’s yellow jersey.

headline.main: Kittel Is First to Capture Two Tour Stages
headline.print_headline: Kittel Is First to Capture Two Tour Stages
